All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Cancellable
Represents an event that can be cancelled.
Channel
The channel is a message target that forwards messages sent to it to all joined targets.
Channel.Builder
The builder of a Channel.
Channel.InvalidKey
The exception is thrown if a channel with an invalid key is created.
ChannelPolicy
 
ChannelPrototype
Internal utility for configuring the prototype of channels.
ChannelRegisteredEvent
The event is fired when a new channel is added to the ChannelRepository.
ChannelRepository
Holds all channels registered on the server.
ChannelRepository.DuplicateChannel
The exception is thrown if someone tries to add a channel with the same key to the repository.
ChannelSerializer
 
ChannelSettingChangedEvent<V>
The event is fired when a setting of a channel has changed.
ChannelSettings
Holds references to all common settings of a Channel.
ChannelSettingsChanged
The event is fired if all settings of a channel change.
ChannelTargetAdded
The event is fired after a new target has been added to a channel.
ChannelTargetRemoved
The event is fired after a target has been remove from a channel.
ChatCommand
Sends a chat message to the active channel of the chatter.
ChatCommand.Builder
The builder of a ChatCommand.
ChatCommand.ChatResult
The result of the ChatCommand containing the final message.
ChatCommand.NoActiveChannel
The exception is thrown if a chatter tries to chat without an active channel.
Chatter
The chatter is a message target that can be used to send and receive messages.
Chatter.Builder
The builder of a Chatter.
Chatter.MessageHandler
The message handler is used to dispatch raw rendered messages to the chatter.
Chatter.PermissionHandler
The permission handler used by a chatter to validate a permission node.
ChatterChangedActiveChannelEvent
This event is fired after a chatter changed his active channel.
ChatterFactory
Used to create new instances of a chatter based on the type of the implementing platform.
ChatterJoinedChannelEvent
The event is fired after a chatter has joined a channel.
ChatterJoinedServerEvent
The ChatterJoinedServerEvent is fired when a chatter has joined the server.
ChatterLeftChannelEvent
The event is fired after a chatter has left a channel.
ChatterPrototype
Internal utility for configuring the prototype of chatters.
ChatterReceivedMessageEvent
The event is fired after a chatter received and accepted a new message.
ChatterRepository
 
ChatterSerializer
 
Command
Represents an operation that can be executed independently and yields a Result.
Command.Builder<B extends Command.Builder<B,C>,C extends Command>
A generic builder used to construct commands.
Command.Error
A generic error that can be thrown by commands.
CommandBuilder<B extends Command.Builder<B,C>,C extends Command>
An abstract base class of the Command.Builder.
ComponentSerializer
 
ConfigReloadedEvent
Dispatched when the configuration was reloaded.
Configurable<T>
Marks a type as configurable allowing the direct setting of settings at runtime.
Configured
Something that can retrieve a Setting from Settings.
Configured.Builder<T>
The builder for creating a configured class.
CreatePrivateChannelCommand
Creates a new private channel between the two chatters.
CreatePrivateChannelCommand.Builder
 
CreatePrivateChannelCommand.Result
 
Entity<K>
Represents an entity that can be stored in a Repository by its key.
EventBus
The sChat event bus.
EventListener
Defines a class which listens to SChatEvents.
EventSubscription<T extends SChatEvent>
Represents a subscription to a SChatEvent.
FilterableCollection<T>
Marks the collection as filterable and adds the FilterableCollection.filter(Predicate) method.
GsonPluginMessageSerializer
 
GsonProvider
 
Identified
Marks an entity as identified requiring it to hold an Identity.
Identity
An identity is an object identified by its unique id.
IdentitySerializer
 
IncomingMessageConsumer
Encapsulates the sChat system which accepts incoming PluginMessages from implementations of Messenger.
InMemoryRepository<K,E extends Entity<K>>
A simple in memory implementation of a Repository.
InstantSerializer
 
Iterators
 
JElement
 
JObject
 
JoinChannelCommand
 
JoinChannelCommand.AccessDenied
 
JoinChannelCommand.Builder
 
JoinChannelEvent
The event is fired before a chatter joins a channel and allows the manipulation of the JoinChannelPolicy and outcome of the JoinChannelCommand.
JoinChannelPolicy
 
LeaveChannelCommand
Command to leave a channel.
LeaveChannelCommand.Builder
The builder of the LeaveChannelCommand.
LeaveChannelEvent
The event is fired before a chatter leaves a channel and allows the manipulation of the LeaveChannelPolicy and outcome of the LeaveChannelCommand.
LeaveChannelPolicy
 
Message
 
Message.Draft
 
Message.Type
 
Messages
A container for messages that can be used to store and persist messages in memory.
MessageSerializer
 
MessageSource
A message source can be anything that is Identified and used to send messages.
MessageSourceSerializer
 
MessageTarget
Represents an object that can receive messages.
MessageTargetSerializer
 
Messenger
Represents an object which dispatches PluginMessages.
Messenger.UnsupportedMessageException
 
MessengerGateway
 
MessengerGatewayProvider
Represents a provider for Messenger instances.
Permissable
 
PluginMessage
 
PluginMessageSerializer
 
Pointer<V>
A pointer to a resource.
Pointered
Something that can retrieve values based on a given Pointer.
Pointers
A collection of pointers.
Pointers.Builder
A builder of pointers.
Policy
 
PrivateChannel
Prototype class for configuring the settings of a private channel.
Repository<K,E extends Entity<K>>
A generic repository for entities.
Repository.NotFound
The exception is thrown if no entity with the given key exists inside the repository.
Result
Represents a generic result, which can either be successful or fail.
Result.Error
Encapsulates an exception thrown during the execution of a Command.
SChatEvent
The root sChat event that must be implemented by all events.
SendChannelMessageEvent
The SendChannelMessageEvent is fired before a Channel forwards a message to its Channel.targets().
SendChannelMessagePolicy
 
SendGlobalMessageEvent
The event is fired when a channel has the ChannelSettings.GLOBAL flag and the message is about to be forwarded to another server.
SendMessageCommand
 
SendMessageCommand.Builder
 
SendMessageCommand.Logging
 
SendMessageEvent
The SendMessageEvent is called before a message is sent to its targets.
SendMessageResult
 
SendPrivateMessageCommand

SetActiveChannelCommand
 
Setting<V>
A setting of a resource with an optional default value.
Settings
A collection of settings.
Settings.Builder
A builder of settings.
SettingsSerializer
 
Subscribe
Subscribes the event in the method parameters to the event bus.
Targets
A container for targets that can be used to combine and filter multiple targets into one target.
TargetsFilter
 
TargetsSerializer
